text: Grumiana is a genus of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae erected by Alexander Borisovich Zhdanko in 2004. It is monotypic, containing only the species Grumiana berezowskii first described by Grigory Grum-Grshimailo in 1902. It is found in Sichuan, China. ==References== Category:Polyommatini Category:Monotypic butterfly genera Category:Lycaenidae genera
title: Grumiana
